components.name: xFVQZF
components.content:
• who uses and benefits from the asset
  • how losing the asset would affect the community
  • why the asset will be lost without intervention

components.name: zTcrYo
components.title: Who in the community currently uses the asset, or has used it in the past?
components.hint:
Include any specific uses and how many people take part in these activities.

Reference any statistics you have to reinforce this. For example, data on footfall.

components.name: whlRYS
components.title: Tell us how losing the asset would affect, or has already affected, people in the community
components.hint: Where possible give examples of these effects, such as important services ending or having to travel a significant distance to use a similar asset.

components.name: NGSXHE
components.title: Why will the asset be lost without community intervention?
components.hint:
Include any evidence you have that it's use by the community will be threatened.

For example, by the owner's intention or an imminent sale

components.name: Ieudgn
components.title: Explain how the community will be better served with the asset under community ownership
components.hint: Include why this is preferable to any other type of ownership.

name: Apply for funding to save an asset in your community
